title: TELL YOUR STORY...
subtitle: This app lets you create and share your authentic story of personal growth and transformation, no matter how good a writer you are or what languages you speak. Just answer a few quick questions and MindBot takes care of the rest.

questions.text: Tell me about a challenge or obstacle you have faced in life that you successfully overcame
questions.placeholder: I used to break into a cold sweat just thinking about presenting at work meetings. My palms would get so sweaty, I once dropped my manager's expensive laser pointer!

questions.text: How did this challenge affect your mindset and daily life? What was the point at which you decided to make a positive change and overcome it
questions.placeholder: Every time a meeting was scheduled, I'd mysteriously develop a 'dental emergency.' Eventually my dentist stopped taking my calls and I ended up with a REAL dental emergency.

questions.text: What are some techniques or workshops you tried that you thought might help, but ended up being disappointing?
questions.placeholder: First, I admitted to myself, to another human being, and to my dentist that I had a problem... And then I tried therapy, but the therapist told me I was totally normal...

questions.text: Is there anything you tried that DID help you to overcome this challenge?
questions.placeholder: I was checking Twitter while at the ER with a (real) dental emergency, when my old friend Mikey who was terrified of heights posted pics from Mt Everest! Said Mindscape changed his life. So I gave it a try...

questions.text: What was your biggest breakthrough moment - when things finally felt like they "clicked" for you?
questions.placeholder: It was in this little town in central America, when I met Will Goodey, founder of Mindscape... Oh, and the seminar was great too

questions.text: If you have any special requests for how I should tell your story, let me know!
questions.placeholder: Use a snarky, irreverent tone because that is usually what my posts are like!
